view.name: ks_localize_view
view.def:
SELECT combinaisons.item_key, combinaisons.lang_key, `ks_locale_values`.value, combinaisons.project_id
FROM ( SELECT * FROM `ks_locale_items_list` LEFT JOIN `ks_locale_tag_items` USING(item_key) LEFT JOIN `ks_locale_tags_list` USING(tag_id) , `ks_locale_languages` ) AS combinaisons LEFT JOIN `ks_locale_values` USING(item_key, lang_key)
